about.title: About the Photographer
about.description1: Ou Weijian, engaged in photography for more than 40 years, specializing in landscape and documentary photography. His works have been selected and awarded in domestic and international exhibitions and competitions, winning international honors including Gold Medal at Hong Kong Youth Photographic Society International Photography Salon and Silver Medal at Toronto International Photography Competition in Canada.
about.description2: Using the lens to record the changes of the times, interpreting humanistic feelings with light and shadow, committed to conveying Chinese stories through images.

About.title: About the Photographer
About.subtitle: Recording the changes of the times through the lens, interpreting humanistic feelings with light and shadow
About.description1: Started learning photography in the late 1970s. Joined Guangdong Wuchuan Photographers Association in 1987, Nanhai Photography Association in 2015, Royal Photographic Society of Great Britain and Global Photographic Union (GPU) in 2016, Foshan Photographers Association in 2017, Guangdong Photographers Association in 2018, and China Photography Copyright Association in 2019.
About.description2: From 2017 to 2020, studied at Beijing Photography Correspondence Institute Guangdong Campus in Basic Class, Advanced Class, and Provincial Member Enhancement Class, receiving the title of Outstanding Student. Works have been selected and awarded in domestic and international exhibitions and competitions multiple times.
About.description3: 'Aerial Ballet' won Gold Medal at the 42nd Hong Kong Youth Photographic Society International Photography Salon in 2017, Silver Medal at TIPF (International Photographers Federation) Toronto International Photography Competition in Canada in 2017, and Bronze Medal at Italy Monsummano 'Tribute to Women' International Four-Region Photography Tour in 2018. 'Big Spin' won Gold Medal at Ukraine POKROVA International Photography Exhibition in 2018. Additionally, over 300 works have been selected or awarded in national, provincial, and international photography exhibitions and competitions.
About.honorsSubtitle: National and international important photography awards
About.honor1: Gold Medal - 42nd Hong Kong Youth Photographic Society International Photography Salon (2017)
About.honor2: Silver Medal - TIPF Toronto International Photography Competition, Canada (2017)
About.honor3: Bronze Medal - Italy Monsummano 'Tribute to Women' International Four-Region Photography Tour (2018)
About.honor4: Gold Medal - Ukraine POKROVA International Photography Exhibition (2018)
About.honor5: Over 300 works selected and awarded in national, provincial and international photography exhibitions
About.exhibitionsSubtitle: Exhibition experience in important domestic and foreign art galleries and art institutions
About.exhibition1: Hong Kong Youth Photographic Society International Photography Salon
About.exhibition2: TIPF (International Photographers Federation) Toronto International Photography Competition
About.exhibition3: Italy Monsummano International Four-Region Photography Tour
About.exhibition5: Various national and provincial photography exhibitions and competitions
About.philosophy1: Photography is not only a display of technology, but also an understanding of life and a witness to the times. Every photo should carry the photographer's emotions and thoughts.
About.philosophy2: I believe that the best photographic works come from real emotions and love for life. Whether it is magnificent mountains and rivers or ordinary life scenes, they all have their unique beauty and stories.
About.philosophy3: Through the lens, I hope to record the changes of this era, so that more people can feel the beauty of life and the pulse of the times through my works.
About.lookingForwardSubtitle: Whether it's artistic exchange, commercial cooperation or photography guidance, you are welcome to contact me
